name: "Men Are Accessories" Tee
description: "Men are accessories, dress them well. After all, if he's yours, he's not gay." Cheeky tee speaking to women dating men. How he looks standing next to you is sometimes as important as a hot purse! Soft 100% cotton tee with baby blue contrasting on neck and sleeves. Check size chart photo and contact with your size. Please allow 10 to 14 business days delivery domestic. Size Chart keywords: t-shirt, tee, shirt, top, blue, fashionista, humor, digitally printed, digital, text

name: "Hold All Night" Clutch - rouge fleur
description: NECESSORIES de Ella Mode; our handbag label-- Handmade, original design clutch style bag with multiply-reinforced, sturdy cutout-style handle. Trimmed in luxe, light-shimmering red floral embroidered twill, including a "belt" along the front and back. The front has a rhinestone frame with "Necessories" label - back has matelasse/crafty-quilt-style stitching. Built for beauty & fun. Fits enough for a night out. Lightweight, swing it around, stuff it full--The handles will barely bend when forced, yet they are comfortable to hold. Go ahead, do what you want, the stitching is virtually indestructible. - 13" w x 8" h x 0~" d / 33 x 20 x .5 cm - 6" (inches) / 15.25 cm wide cutout handle - 3 interior pockets (1 cell*, 1 drop, 1 zip) - Nickel magnetic snap below the cutout - Cotton, linen, lycra *This small bag's "cell" pocket fits smaller phones, but there are more pockets. CARE: This purse has been treated to resist lint collection on the black fabric. It is suggested to treat occasionally with an all-natural (no dyes, etc.) dryer sheet and be rubbed with a lint brush after a use or so. Store in its couture sleeper bag in pink fleece. Please only spot treat this bag with gentle soap, like Dove. *Note: Italy does not allow the import of sewn items.* keywords: handbag, clutch, evening, hand bag, black, red, floral, fabric, diamonds

name: Big Bling Ring "Top Button Collection"
description: Stick your right-hand-ring finger at those with big bling, with this tongue-in-chic indie big-bit of faux bling. (Or wear on casual days that free you to get funked up.) I just love mixing "normal" buttons with fine materials, and using "simple" buttons for a dressier look! Positively diamond-like prior to inspection, this fun costume ring is made out of a button, with white-gold plated ring and matching sterling silver wire. Ring base is adjustable true white-gold plated. (Not itself plated, as a standard engagement ring is.) The button also has a bit of a glass meets tiles look, but button is secured with just enough give to be able to rock back and forth occasionally to catch in the light and show off some shine. This ring may be inexpensive and not a gem stone, but is not cheaply put together like other "imitation" or bargain chain store items. It's still a high quality made item, only affordable and fun. Button is .75" (inches) / 1.9 cm in diameter (diamond-shape up). TIP: I've noticed that the white gold of the rings does not tarnish if ring is stored in plastic when not worn. *Please note that Australia does not allow import of jewelry.* keywords: ring, diamond, rhinestone, button

name: "Pinback" Buttons Brooch
description: As cute as they are, many love buttons, those sew-what-sew-buttons buttons with shankes or 2 or 4 holes... and yet somehow others like those pins, those "badges" those pinback buttons. So we're starting a line of brooch pins backing decorated sewing buttons to soothe all your fashion crafty cravings. Here is our first. In pink and green argyle, a diamond-y rhinestoney button, a diamond-shaped knit lace recycled from a sweater, some genuine sterling silver wire slightly antiqued that lies on top in an interesting criss-cross fashion, and a small swivel clasp. The pin is the high quality kind that secures to design with sewing holes (wire looped through) and a swivel head with sharp pin swinging away. It's so much larger and textured than a normal pinback button and funky/cute; young/hip, not your grandmother's boring brooches. keywords: brooch, pin, accessory, buttons, pink, argyle, diamond

name: "Shh Counting!" Knitting T (digital print--no hand!)
description: Possibly the most representative tee for all knitters. "Shhh, I'm counting!" puts across the aggravation and frustration we all feel. Counting is difficult when somebody's yakking at ya. This shirt is perfect for when you take your knitting out in public, especially new projects when casting on is required and there's NO avoiding the 1, 2, 3 or 2, 4, 6... Full color, detailed tee shirt is digitally printed by a professional process that produces photographic quality, long lasting shirts with NO hand (hard or different feel on the design)! Instead it's chemically bonded to the fibers just like it's apart of the fabric. Design of continental cast-on method and text in vibrant colors. Subtle numbers in background of design. Fitted ladies tee in organic cotton with a slight eggshell tone of the white. 100% organic fine jersey cotton American Apparel tee base Washing instructions: turn inside out, wash cold, hang dry on padded hanger. Please allow 10 to 14 business days delivery domestic. Size Chart keywords: t-shirt, tee, shirt, top, knitting, humor, digitally printed, digital, graphic
